name: R4B-Evidence-R5-Evidence
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Evidence into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `Evidence` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence`

element.display: When the summary was approved by publisher

target.display: When the summary was approved by publisher
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.approvalDate`
R4B `Evidence.assertion` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.assertion`
R4B `Evidence.author` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.author`

element.display: Certainty or quality of the evidence

target.display: Certainty or quality of the evidence
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.certainty` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty`

R4B `Evidence.certainty.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.certainty.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description
R4B `Evidence.certainty.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.certainty.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Evidence.certainty.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.certainty.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.certainty.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `Evidence.certainty.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.certainty.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Individual or group who did the rating

target.display: Individual or group who did the rating
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.certainty.rater` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty.rater`

element.display: Assessment or judgement of the aspect

target.display: Assessment or judgement of the aspect
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.certainty.rating` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty.rating`

element.display: A domain or subdomain of certainty

target.display: A domain or subdomain of certainty
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.certainty.subcomponent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty.subcomponent`
R4B `Evidence.certainty.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.certainty.type`
R4B `Evidence.citeAs[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.citeAs[x]`
R4B `Evidence.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.contact`
R4B `Evidence.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.contained`
R4B `Evidence.date` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.date`
R4B `Evidence.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.description`
R4B `Evidence.editor` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.editor`
R4B `Evidence.endorser` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.endorser`
R4B `Evidence.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Evidence.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.id`
R4B `Evidence.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.implicitRules`
R4B `Evidence.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: When the summary was last reviewed

target.display: When the summary was last reviewed by the publisher
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.lastReviewDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.lastReviewDate`
R4B `Evidence.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.meta`

R4B `Evidence.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Evidence.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.publisher`

element.display: Link or citation to artifact associated with the summary

target.display: Link or citation to artifact associated with the summary
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.relatedArtifact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.relatedArtifact`
R4B `Evidence.reviewer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.reviewer`

element.display: Values and parameters for a single statistic

target.display: Values and parameters for a single statistic
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic`
R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate`

element.display: A nested attribute estimate; which is the attribute estimate of an attribute estimate

target.display: A nested attribute estimate; which is the attribute estimate of an attribute estimate
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.attributeEstimate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.attributeEstimate`

element.display: Textual description of the attribute estimate

target.display: Textual description of the attribute estimate
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description

R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.id`

element.display: Level of confidence interval, eg 0.95 for 95% confidence interval

target.display: Level of confidence interval, e.g., 0.95 for 95% confidence interval
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.level` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.level`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

element.display: Footnote or explanatory note about the estimate

target.display: Footnote or explanatory note about the estimate
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: The singular quantity of the attribute estimate, for attribute estimates represented as single values; also used to report unit of measure

target.display: The singular quantity of the attribute estimate, for attribute estimates represented as single values; also used to report unit of measure
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.quantity`

target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.range` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.range`

element.display: The type of attribute estimate, eg confidence interval or p value

target.display: The type of attribute estimate, e.g., confidence interval or p value
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.attributeEstimate.type`
R4B `Evidence.statistic.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.category`

R4B `Evidence.statistic.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Evidence.statistic.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description
R4B `Evidence.statistic.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.statistic.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Evidence.statistic.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.id`

target.display: An aspect of the statistical model
target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic`

target.comment: R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.attributeEstimate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.attributeEstimate`
R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.code`

R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: A variable adjusted for in the adjusted analysis

R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.variable.handling` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.variable.handling` - handling has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/variable-handling|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/variable-handling|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.variable.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Evidence.statistic.modelCharacteristic.variable.id`
